name: Library Helper
description:
This is a short game where you have to catch the falling books to keep your master's library from getting messy! Cast your spells to put books back where they go, and don't let any books touch the floor!

Controls:
A & D - Left & Right
Space - Cast Spell

Tips:
The level wraps, so walking off an edge will put you at the other edge!
The more books you carry the heavier you'll get, therefore slower!
The bigger your stack of books, the better the score you get when you cast your spell!
